string-array.name: arry_instruction_step1
string-array.item: 1. Press and hold Power button while turning on the scale. When the LED display shows nACAIA and then SEt, release the Power button.
2. For version 1.0(some of early bird), the LED will display -1.0-. DO NOT apply firmware update. Please contact acaia for further information.

string-array.name: arry_instruction_step2
string-array.item: 1. When the acaia scale is off. Press and hold Power button to turn ON the scale, and the LED display shows nACAIA and then SEt, press and hold T button for another 2 seconds without releasing Power button. When the LED display shows F.0000 with the very left 0 flashing, release both Power and T buttons.
2. Please input the password as "0419". Here are the operations:
a. Click T button to change the digit number.
b. Click Power button for moving to previous digit.
c. Long press T button for moving to next digit.
3. After you input the password, long press the T button to confirm.
4. If the password is correctly input, the LED will display ISP or UPdAtE. Which means the scale is now in firmware update mode.

string-array.item: 1 If the password is correctly input, the LED will display ISP or UPdAtE. Which means the scale is now in firmware update mode.

string-array.name: arry_instruction_step4
string-array.item: If for any reason (including out of battery), the acaia scale shuts down during firmware update, please restart the Firmware Update with the following procedure.
1. Press and hold the Power Button for 1 second to start the scale. There will be no display at all on the LED display, but the left yellow LED indicator will light on
2. In the lunar updater, return to "Select Scale" and reconnect.
3. Restart Step 3 to continue the firmware update.
